title: Console Indicator Light Sequence Control
description:
A console is equipped with 3 indicator lights, which are green, red, and yellow. It is necessary to cyclically control the status of these lights using a control button.
Control requirements:
Use an input parameter 'controlButton' to represent the state of the control button, which is a pulse signal, generating a transition from 0 to 1 each time it is triggered.
Use three output parameters 'greenLight', 'redLight', and 'yellowLight' to control the corresponding green, red, and yellow indicator lights.
The sequence of button triggers and the corresponding light statuses are as follows:
1st trigger: Only the green light 'greenLight' is on.
2nd trigger: Only the red light 'redLight' is on.
3rd trigger: Only the yellow light 'yellowLight' is on.
4th trigger: All three lights are on.
5th trigger: All three lights are off.
6th trigger and onwards: Repeat the above cycle.
name: FB_ColorLightControl
